text: Arthur Napoleon Raymond Robinson (16 December 1926 - 9 April 2014) was a Trinbagonian politician. He was the third President of Trinidad and Tobago, serving from 19 March 1997 to 17 March 2003. He was also Trinidad and Tobago's third Prime Minister, serving from 18 December 1986 to 17 December 1991. Robinson helped create the International Criminal Court. Robinson died at the St Claire Medical Center, in Port of Spain, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== *A.N.R.
